tool_description: Evaluates how well different fibers and yarn choices suit specific seasons and climate conditions.

fiber_types.description: Fibers to evaluate for seasonal appropriateness

target_season.description: Season of intended use (spring, summer, fall, winter, year_round)

climate_type.description: Climate conditions (tropical, temperate, continental, arid, polar)

activity_level.description: Expected activity level when wearing (sedentary, moderate, active, athletic)

error_messages: Unknown fiber type: All fiber types must be recognized natural or synthetic fibers.
Invalid season: Target season must be one of: spring, summer, fall, winter, or year_round.
Unsupported climate: Climate type must be one of: tropical, temperate, continental, arid, or polar.
Invalid activity level: Activity level must be one of: sedentary, moderate, active, or athletic.
usage: Provide fiber_types array, target_season, and climate_type. Optionally specify activity_level for more precise recommendations. The tool evaluates thermal properties, breathability, and moisture management for seasonal appropriateness.

suitability_scores.description: Seasonal suitability score for each fiber (1-10)

best_fiber.description: Most suitable fiber from the provided list

thermal_rating.description: Overall warmth assessment (very_cool, cool, neutral, warm, very_warm)

moisture_management.description: How well fibers handle moisture (poor, fair, good, excellent)

seasonal_recommendations.description: Specific suggestions for optimizing seasonal comfort
